cube

Class Cube.Face

  • java.lang.Object
    • cube.Cube.Face
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFace
    Enclosing class:
    Cube

    public class Cube.Face
extends Object
implements IFace
    This class represents a face of the Rubik's cube
    An object of this class has an initial orientation which is final,
    a dynamic orientation which can change every transition,
    and a matrix of colors represent the colors on this face in the initial state.

        public Cube.Face(Orientation orientation)
        Constructor of an object of the type face.

        public Colors getColor(int row,

        Returns the color of a position in a face
        Specified by:
        getColor in interface IFace
        Parameters:
        row - Row in a face
        col - Column in a face

      • turn

        public void turn(Direction direction)
        Represents a turn of the face in a desired direction.
        It uses the dynamic orientation and the actions table to derive
        the number of flips and rotation needed in order to bring this face to the bottom.
        after this face is brought to the bottom, it is turn in the desired direction.
        Specified by:
        turn in interface IFace
        Parameters:
        direction - The direction that the face should turn
